markdownRemark.html:
Welcome! This is the portal to TU Delft's Academic Heritage and the Special Collections of TU Delft Library. Visit online exhibitions, browse the digital collections, learn more about the history of the university or get in touch with the Academic Heritage Team of TU Delft Library.

Rise of a Campus

Floor plans

Would you like to become a friend? Please visit the website of Histechnica, the Friends Association of TU Delft's Academic Heritage.

Pendulum clock

Since 2017, when TU Delft celebrated its 175th anniversary, the university has been investing in raising the profile of its academic heritage by improving the preservation of its collections, initiating research projects and organising on-campus presentations in collaboration with students and academic staff.
